basecost [gcost]: 100

(animal [animal], trample [trample])

item slots [slots]: head(crown only), 3 misc
The members of the Elephant Clan are sociable and wise like Elephant. They rely on friends and hard work to accomplish their goals. Elephant is their friend and they use his kin as allies, in work and in warfare. The war elephants of the Elephant Clan are gifts from Elephant himself, and they are not as cowardly as the war elephants of other nations.
